div.p: I wanted to do this kind of work because it’s always appealed to me really being in an office, I’ve sort of seen it on TV and, you know, my mum’s
always worked in this kind of environment and a few other family members and things they’ve said sort of made me think oh yeah I’d quite like to do that
or I could do that and I think you just get to dress smartly and I think where I’ve always been quite organised as well it’s something where
I can put that to good use organising my workload and things. And being able to sort of mix with different kinds of people, it allows you to do that
and it’s sort of more computer-based and that’s what I like to do really.
I do enjoy the most being around the people I work with because they’re a great bunch, I enjoy meeting new people as well,
I enjoy getting on with tasks, sort of throwing myself into it and being set a task and maybe doing it a different way or learning something new
from it and being able to design spreadsheets and things like that for different things to store data. It’s just so varied that’s what I like
so much about the job you can just get on with so many different things it’s not just one sort of set dead-end thing that you do every day
which can get quite tedious and boring it’s just you can be on the phone, you can be typing things up, you can be sort of moving around the office,
helping people, meeting new people, yeah that’s what I enjoy about it.
